StructuredXMLResume.ExecutiveSummary: A result-driven professional with nearly 2 years of experience in Retail/ Forex Trade and Banking Operations of Finnacle and related activities Presently associated with ICICI Bank as Deputy Manager Hands-on experience in various tools & technologies such as Python(OOPS, Collections, POP and exception Handling, data encapsulation), SQL and many more Experienced in DMAT Account/ Trading & Finance Account Skilled in working on Finacle Tools; successfully updated all the banking transaction database within stipulated timeline

PositionHistory.Title: Deputy Manager
PositionHistory.Description:
to Apr 2018 Key Result Areas: Administering end-to-end Banking Operations inclusive of managing all types of banking products Acting as an escalation gate; addressing and resolving queries of Corporate and HNI Accounts pertaining to banking products which resulting in achievement of customer satisfaction matrices Documenting and updating all the banking transaction database in Finacle Tool Monitoring and evaluating: The customer accounts; updating the KYC details of customers who all are falling in different risk categories; ensuring adherence to service standards of the bank & regulatory compliance as laid down by RBI & other regulatory authorities Post loan disbursement activities including processing of release letters, recovery of bad debts, NPA, preparation of
https://freesearch.naukri.com/preview/printResume?uname=c88 090958503a4454405a4d5f0b02546&sid=3810263223&AT=1580681127 2/2/20 23&09
compromise proposals and associated legal proceedings Maintaining Suspicious Transaction Reports; submitting the same to the Branch Head to avoid any case of fraud and risk to the banks image Mitigating financial risk through the development and implementation of strategic measures Managing various credit operations involving appraising proposals, conducting risk analysis & scrutinizing relevant documents before sanctioning loans Indulging in overall risk & exposures of customers, involving risk assessment, internal / external rating, monitoring mitigants & portfolio risks Scrutinzing and reviewing existing working capital limits Performing analytical review of financial operations of the process; interpreting financial data for determining past financial performance and projecting the financial probability of process Investigating key business issues behind the numbers and providing clear, concise & timely analysis

Degree.Comments: PG: PG Diploma (Banking and Finance) from ICICI Manipal University in 2018
UG: B.Tech/B.E. (Electronics and Instrumentation Engineering) from Babu Banarasi Das Northern India Instiute of Technology in 2014

sov:ExperienceSummary.sov:Description: Geetika Raizada's experience appears to be somewhat concentrated in Finance (mostly Operations) and slightly concentrated in Business Operations and General Business (mostly Management Activities or Functions). Geetika Raizada's experience appears to be lower-to-mid level, with about 2 years of experience, with several years tenure in management, including a mid-level position.
